name: shopify-next-netlify-chrishannaby
description: This is a Next.js + Shopify Cart API demo! [Check out the site here](https://next-shopify-example.netlify.app/). If you want to make your own version, make sure you create a Shopify account and create some products, and install the [Netlify CLI](https://docs.netlify.com/cli/get-started/).
